title: Handle Product Usage Inquiry
description: A customer bought a complex piece of equipment and is asking for help with the initial setup.

tasks.description: Identify the product the customer is asking about.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the product in the system.

tasks.description: Find the product's user manual or setup guide in the knowledge base.
Walk the customer through the first few steps of the setup process or email them the guide.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, actionable instructions to the customer.
